name: Super Wave Runner
description:
Help Wave to recover itens stolen by his dog Riff!

Run, jump and dash to avoid enemies and traps along the way while trying to catch Riff.

Collect gears to unlock new characters and skills,

and Most Importantly, do it before your boss notice whats happening!!

The controls are simple

You'll be provided with a button to jump on the left side of the screen and a button to dash on the right side of the screen.

This game was made as a homage to Megaman X Corrupted by JKBGames. Wave and Riff are original characters created by him and his crew, all rights reserved to them.

Programming made by: Garzet

Steelpine Forest music made by: MezzMeruso

If you want to report a bug, you can reach my on my Twitter or Discord  Shiraku#3050
